Easy to use  screen capture tool. Take screenshot, edit, download

The creation of screen capture is easy as it ever could be. Choose from the partial area and take it in a click. Then you can fully customize screenshots by adding text, drawing lines, arrows, and shapes. 

The main advantage of the Tool is that features for content creation are gathered in one place which is reached by a single click in a browser. It's an advanced service for every day working with screenshots,and file  can be shared, printed, or saved fast, easily, and with quality.
